sn47.41:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.41:1.8: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.41:1.9: Imesu, bhikkhave, catusu satipatthanesu suppatitthitacitta viharatha.
